package_info.mp_subtitle: A demo site demonstrating Twig in Melis Platform
package_info.mp_description:
Melis Demo CMS Twig is a ready to install website demonstrating the use of Twig as an alternative templating engine for CMS pages.

The site makes use of templating plugins, drag'n'drop, sliders, and more.

A great reference for developers and template designers taking advantage of Twig.
